about_the_game:
Take on the night shift at a roadside diner where routine tasks soon spiral into something far more sinister. In this demo, you'll experience approximately 20% of the full game's gameplay, including all core mechanics like first-person interactive gameplay, survival elements, and restaurant work simulation.

As the blood moon rises, you'll perform typical duties like washing dishes, cleaning, and carrying boxes to the basement. But be prepared—your shift takes a chilling turn when supernatural threats emerge. Follow the mysterious rules to survive and get a taste of the immersive horror that awaits in the full game.

"Thick fog crept slowly across the marshes along Highway 285 in New Mexico, occasionally revealing the strangely orange reflection of the moon."


Key Features of the Demo:

  • First-Person Interactive Gameplay

  • 3D Gameplay in a Confined Location

  • Survival Mechanics

  • Restaurant Work Simulator (e.g., cleaning, operating the dishwasher, taking out the trash)

  • Puzzle-solving Mechanics

  • Introduction to the Game’s Storyline

  • First Encounter with Supernatural Threats

  • Immersive Atmosphere of the Full Game

  • Exploration and Object Interaction

  • Money-Earning Mechanics

Are you ready to survive your first shift?
